mapper.select: SELECT permissions.* FROM permissions INNER JOIN role_permissions ON permissions.id = role_permissions.permission_id WHERE role_permissions.role_id = #{roleId} AND permissions.deleted_at IS NULL AND role_permissions.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY permissions.sort_order ASC, permissions.id ASC
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM roles WHERE id = #{roleId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND is_active = '1'

SELECT * FROM roles WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roles (name, description, sort_order, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{sortOrder}, #{isActive}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

(#{item.roleId}, #{item.permissionId},#{item.createdAt},#{item.updatedAt})
